data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anisyutkin, Leonid N., Anichkin, Alexandr E., Thinh, Nguyen Van (2013): Macrostylopyga gen. nov., a new genus of cockroaches (Dictyoptera: Blattidae), with descriptions of two new species. Zootaxa 3635 (5): 520-532, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3635.5
